titles.title: We are marching in the light of God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
// We are marching in the light of God,
We are marching in the light of God. //

verse.name: c1
v2
verse.lines:
// We are living in the love of God
We are living in the love of God //

verse.name: c2
v3
verse.lines:
// We are moving in the power of God
We are moving in the power of God //

verse.name: c3
v4
verse.lines:
// We are dancing in the joy of God
We are dancing in the joy of God //

verse.name: c4
